portfolio.title: Baby Sitting Web App
portfolio.description: This application helps a baby's parents and pet's owner to keep track of their feeding and changing diper process. I have often heard it is hard to remember what parents do for their baby, and that brought me this idea. Since all process will be tracked and recorded on this application, it is possible to share their task list with their partner and someone related to sitting their loved ones. Including the idea of Social media app, E commance app, Messaging app, and Productivity app.
